Subject: Problem with Marketing Campaign Metrics

Marketing campaign metrics are not being tracked correctly because of an outdated Hadoop version You can reach me at janesmith@company.com.. Although we have upgraded Hadoop and rebooted the Hub, the problem continues. Could you please help us resolve this issue promptly? My name is John Doe.
